column4: yeah, I had that problem with my Toshiba Satellite A25 until I had to do something in the terminal with the codecs or whatever. Whatever though, the Video card in the motherboard fried. bye bye, Toshiba.
Do you have a link so a guide you followed or something?
Uh... yeah, let me hit up the Linux forums.
Good deal, good luck! (Buy Dell next time, haha)
